name: Stichting CINOP - ecbo
goal:
Foundation CINOP - ecbo is appointed by the ministry of education (NAU) as national agency Erasmus+ for vet and adult education. Foundation CINOP - ecbo is an expert organisation in the field of vet and lifelong learning.

The NA Erasmus+ has formulated a vision entitled ‘Changing the mind-set of the learner’. With this vision, the NA E+ would like to contribute to adding international and intercultural competences, to focusing on employability and citizenship and to bridging cultural barriers, while respecting national and sectoral differences. The focus remains on the link between education and the world of work to foster continuous learning. The NA E+ operates as a ‘connecting agent’ between the European Commission, the relevant ministries, and the worlds of education and work.

CINOP is also responsible NCP ECVET/EQAVET, Euroguidance, NLQF and EPALE.
interests: Business and Industry, Culture, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Sport, Youth
euInitiatives:
